name: Berserker (GarfielVulcan)
description:
"The criminals killed countless people of the kingdom."

"Kill the throttle like crazy"

"Walked across countless corpses"

"Being hunted by the army of the kingdom"

"This crazy cycle leads to a silent end."

"One death will lead to one life."

----------------------------------------------------------------

Berserker is an RPGmaker game about a madman who escapes a prison and escapes from the pursuit of a kingdom.

Garrr YAHA!!! It's my first time making an RPGmaker game!! I've always wanted to make an RPGMaker, even if it's not very good. The game is playable in about 45-60 minutes or more than that and there is only one ending 

----------------------------------------------------------------

IMPORTANT!('w')

I am just a crazy person and this is my first project of this size! I would love you for eternity if you could leave us a short comment and rating on this page !!

Thank youu !!
